workshoptitle: Introduction to the Essbase Web Interface

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Access Oracle Essbase
tutorials.description: Log in to Essbase as a power user or service administrator.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Application
tutorials.description: Import an application using a sample application workbook.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Add Dimensions
tutorials.description: Add two dimensions to your outline; build one manually and build another using a text file and rule file.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Load Data
tutorials.description: Load product data to your application using a text file and data load rule file.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Compare Outlines
tutorials.description: Compare two outlines in the Essbase web interface.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
